summary:

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

The upcoming Weekend Ka Vaar episode of Bigg Boss 18 is set to be packed with intense drama as host Salman Khan addresses important topics surrounding Chahat Pandey and her mother's comments about Avinash Mishra.

  • Chahat Pandey's mother criticized Avinash Mishra for derogatory remarks about her daughter.
  • Salman Khan challenges Chahat about her mother’s statements and shares a personal photo to provoke her.
  • Avinash demands Chahat acknowledge her relationship based on the shared anniversary photo.
  • Kashish Kapoor apologizes to Salman for her behavior in the previous episode.
“Your mother has given you a character certificate, letting the world know what type of guy you like.” - Salman Khan

As the tension unfolds, viewers are left wondering if Chahat will admit to her relationship or deny it. The episode promises to deliver significant drama and revelations in the ongoing Bigg Boss season.

Ashneer Grover trademarks his name; Netizens say, 'Now Sony TV will have to pay royalties' - Indian Startup News
summary:
Ashneer Grover trademarks his name; Netizens say, 'Now Sony TV will have to pay royalties'

Publication Date: N/A Source: Indian Startup News

Former Shark Tank India judge Ashneer Grover has officially trademarked his name, allowing him to strengthen his brand identity and expand his commercial reach. This was confirmed by his trademark lawyer, who shared the details on LinkedIn.

Key Points

  • Ashneer Grover has trademarked his name under class 41 of the Trade Marks Act, 1999.
  • Celebrity trademarks are a complex issue in India.
  • Famous personalities like Alia Bhatt and SRK have successfully trademarked their names.
  • Netizens reacted humorously to the news, discussing implications and making jokes.

Notable Quotes

"After navigating legal landscapes, we achieved this significant milestone. This trademark not only strengthens their brand identity but also expands their commercial reach beyond entertainment." - Aditi Tuteja
"Now sony television have to pay royalties for using the name of ashneer sir and tagging him in YouTube videos for the views." - Netizen Reaction

Overall, Grover's trademark could set a precedent for celebrity branding in India, as reactions from the public highlight the evolving nature of intellectual property in entertainment.
newTitle: Ashneer Grover trademarks his name; Netizens react humorously

title: Junaid Khan first saw parents Aamir Khan and Reena Dutta fight when he was 19, opens up about dealing with their divorce: ‘He wasn’t totally absent’ - The Indian Express
summary:
Junaid Khan first saw parents Aamir Khan and Reena Dutta fight when he was 19, opens up about dealing with their divorce: ‘He wasn’t totally absent’

Date: Not specified | Source: Indian Express

Junaid Khan, son of Bollywood superstar Aamir Khan, shares insights about growing up with divorced parents and his relationship with his family.

  • Junaid made his acting debut with Maharaj (2024).
  • Aamir Khan and Reena Dutta divorced in 2002 after 16 years of marriage.
  • Junaid did not witness any fights between his parents until he was 19.
  • He appreciates how his parents handled their divorce maturely for the benefit of their children.
  • Junaid, along with his sister Ira, maintains a close family bond, meeting regularly for family tea.
  • He noted that Aamir has evolved and spends more time with the family as he ages.
  • On the work front, Junaid will act alongside Khushi Kapoor and Sai Pallavi in upcoming projects.
“I think it was probably a mature thing to do. I mean two good people aren’t always good together.” - Junaid Khan

In conclusion, despite their divorce, Aamir and Reena have ensured a loving environment for their children, allowing them to maintain a strong familial bond.
newTitle: Junaid Khan Reflects on Parents' Divorce and His Childhood

title: Arjun Kapoor says got ‘less work’ from Karan Johar’s Dharma Productions because Varun Dhawan made ‘a fool’ of him - The Indian Express
summary:
Arjun Kapoor says got ‘less work’ from Karan Johar’s Dharma Productions because Varun Dhawan made ‘a fool’ of him

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: The Indian Express

In a candid interview, Arjun Kapoor shares insights from his early acting career, focusing on a short film he made with childhood friend Varun Dhawan, revealing how it affected his opportunities with Karan Johar's Dharma Productions.

  • Arjun Kapoor and Varun Dhawan have been childhood friends and acted together early in their careers.
  • Arjun discussed a short film where he believed he had a lead role but discovered he was actually cast as the villain.
  • He humorously attributes getting ‘less work’ from Dharma Productions to Varun's misleading direction in the film.
  • Arjun quoted Varun’s memorable dialogue from the film to highlight its unexpected twist.
  • He mentioned the short film was even shown to Karan Johar, which he feels impacted his later career opportunities.
“Varun basically made a fool of me... I found out after the shoot that I was the villain.”

This light-hearted reflection on their past underscores the bond between the two actors and offers insights into the unpredictability of show business.
newTitle: Arjun Kapoor Reflects on Early Work with Varun Dhawan and Karan Johar's Productions

title: Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani Re-Release Box Office Day 1: Clocks 2nd Biggest Opening For A Bollywood Re-Release, Tumbbad’s 1.65 Crores Are Safe! - Koimoi
summary:
Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani Re-Release Box Office Day 1: Clocks 2nd Biggest Opening For A Bollywood Re-Release

Publication Date: Recent update | Source: Koimoi

Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani, starring Ranbir Kapoor and Deepika Padukone, has made a strong comeback with its re-release, achieving significant box office numbers in its opening.

  • The film recorded a net collection of 1.25 crore in India on its first day.
  • It has become the second-biggest opening for a Bollywood re-release, following Tumbbad which collected 1.65 crores.
  • Despite a limited release, the film received enthusiastic reception with many theatres reported to be almost full.
  • The film originally released in 2013 and has developed a cult following.
  • YJHD has a total box office collection now standing at 191.28 crore, needing only 8.72 crores to reach the 200 crore milestone.
“In the past, some re-releases started with significantly lower openings yet earned big over time.”

The success of the re-release indicates the lasting appeal of 'Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani' and suggests a promising road ahead as it continues to draw audiences.
newTitle: Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani Re-Release Achieves 2nd Biggest Opening for Bollywood

title: Delhi High Court grants Mirchi interim relief in copyright suit over Kareena Kapoor talk show - Bar & Bench - Indian Legal News
summary:
Delhi High Court Grants Mirchi Interim Relief in Copyright Suit Over Kareena Kapoor Talk Show

Published on: 04 Jan 2025, 5:45 am

The Delhi High Court recently granted interim relief to radio broadcaster Mirchi in a copyright suit filed against MissMalini over clips from the ‘What Women Want’ talk show hosted by Kareena Kapoor Khan.

  • Mirchi claims that MissMalini Entertainment violated a prior agreement by uploading clips without proper approval.
  • The clips in question had obscured the ‘Mirchi’ logo while adding MissMalini's branding.
  • The Court ordered the removal of these clips from YouTube and Instagram within 48 hours.
  • MEPL is restrained from using Mirchi's copyrighted material until the next hearing on May 13.
Justice Mini Pushkarna granted ex parte interim injunction in favor of Mirchi.

This ruling reinforces copyright protections in the media industry and emphasizes the importance of prior agreements in content distribution.
newTitle: Delhi High Court Grants Mirchi Interim Relief in Copyright Suit Over Kareena Kapoor Talk Show

title: Keerthy Suresh reveals she had ‘nightmares’ about eloping with husband Antony, was in a long-distance relationship with him during college - The Indian Express
summary:
Keerthy Suresh Opens Up About Her Journey to Marriage with Antony Thattil

Publication Date: January 04, 2025

Source: Indian Express

Acclaimed South Indian actress Keerthy Suresh recently shared her heartfelt story of love and marriage as she tied the knot with long-time partner Antony Thattil. The couple's journey began during her school years and evolved through a long-distance relationship.

  • Keerthy Suresh and Antony Thattil were married on December 12, 2024, in Goa.
  • The couple celebrated their wedding in a traditional Tamil Brahmin and Malayali Christian ceremony.
  • Keerthy reflected on their long-distance relationship while she was in school and he was working in Qatar.
  • Antony provided unwavering support throughout Keerthy's acting career.
  • Keerthy expressed gratitude for Antony's patience regarding their marriage timeline.
  • She credited her father and Antony as significant figures in her life.
“If there are people out there thinking that this man is lucky to have her, trust me I am lucky to have him. I am very happy that this happened.” - Keerthy Suresh

This intimate wedding marks a new chapter for Keerthy and Antony, who have been together for many years. Keerthy continues to work in films, with her latest project being 'Baby John'.
newTitle: Keerthy Suresh Opens Up About Her Journey to Marriage with Antony Thattil

title: Govinda's wife Sunita Ahuja reacts to Varun Dhawan being compared to him: ‘Usko bhi bura lagta hoga' - Hindustan Times
summary:
Sunita Ahuja Comments on Varun Dhawan's Comparisons to Govinda

Date: Jan 04, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Sunita Ahuja, wife of the renowned actor Govinda, spoke out regarding the comparisons drawn between her husband and contemporary actor Varun Dhawan. She expressed confusion over the rationale behind such comparisons.

  • Sunita Ahuja shared her perspective on Varun Dhawan being compared to her husband, Govinda.
  • She commented that Varun might feel uncomfortable about the comparisons to both Govinda and Salman Khan.
  • Sunita acknowledged Varun's exposure to Govinda’s work from childhood, suggesting some resemblance might naturally occur.
  • Govinda was last seen in the 2019 film, 'Rangeela Raja', and has more projects lined up.
  • Varun Dhawan has multiple upcoming films, including 'Sunny Sanskari Ki Tulsi Kumari' and 'Border 2'.
“Bolte hain, compare karte hain, but kyun bolte hain mereko ye samajh me nahi aata hai.” - Sunita Ahuja

This commentary from Sunita reveals her feelings about the unnecessary comparisons that media and audiences often make between actors across generations.
newTitle: Sunita Ahuja Comments on Varun Dhawan's Comparisons to Govinda

title: Govinda’s wife Sunita Ahuja implies they live separately, isn’t sure if he’s cheating on her: ‘Khali baitha hai kuch kar na daale’ - The Indian Express
summary:
Govinda’s Wife Sunita Ahuja Discusses Their Marriage and Rumors

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Indian Express

Sunita Ahuja recently opened up about her marriage to Govinda, highlighting their separate living arrangements and raising suspicions about his fidelity.

  • Sunita revealed they live in separate houses, with Govinda often spending time at his bungalow.
  • She mentioned that their relationship initiated by her, and reflected on Govinda's lack of romantic gestures.
  • After 37 years of marriage, Sunita expressed her worries regarding Govinda's potential affairs as he grows older.
  • Despite past affairs rumors during his peak career, Sunita is more cautious now that he is over 60.
“Khaali baitha hai kuch kar na daale” (he is sitting idle, what if he does something).

Although they have shared their lives together, Sunita's apprehensions about their future together illustrate the complexities of their long-term marriage.
